output: html_document

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(xts)
library(forecast)

cbe_raw <- read_tsv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/feb-sofia/timeseries-2022-2023/main/data/cbe.csv")

tidx <- zoo::as.yearmon(
  seq.Date(
    as.Date("1958-01-01"),
    by = "month",
    length.out = nrow(cbe_raw))
)
beer <- xts(cbe_raw$elec, tidx)
```
```{r}
beer %>% autoplot()
```
